data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字

Two ____ have ____ six ____ periods, but ____ have ____ beyond ____. data.partBlankContent: There are no shootouts during the Playoffs. Instead, multiple sudden-death, 20-minute five-on-five per____ are pla___ until o__ team sco___. data.fullContent: There are no shootouts during the Playoffs. Instead, multiple sudden-death, 20-minute five-on-five periods are played until one team scores. Two games have reached six overtime periods, but none have gone beyond six. During playoff overtime periods, the only break is to clean the loose ice at the first stoppage after the period is halfway finished.
data.answer: 季后赛没有点球大战。取而代之的是在特定时间后，首先得分者获胜，20分钟5对5的比赛，直到一个队得分。有两场比赛进入了6个加时赛阶段，但没有一场超过6个加时赛阶段。在季后赛加时赛期间，唯一的休息是在赛段过半第一次暂停时清理松散的冰。
